response.overview: The story of a boy who, despite losing his sight at a very young age, decides to fight to return to normality, to normal everyday functioning in society. Thanks to his irresistible will to fight, step by step, his world of functioning expands. He obtains higher education. He becomes a teacher. He feels needed. He goes to work. His well-being and self-esteem increase. Only one thing is missing for him to be happy...
response.title: Bez wizji
